Entries.default:
"Avast and flogging fuck, captain! You eyeing that thrice-shat, bare poles, lump of lumber yonder? That be the Misery's Delight, Malnaj's pus-stuffed chancre of a boat!"

He points wildly at a half-galley docked nearby. Only two hands hold the deck. The remaining crew may be belowdecks, or they may be ashore.
"I can't keep track of all your pirate friends."
"Let's hurry then. This can't be a coincidence."

"Malnaj! High Queen Sea-Devil of the Deadfire! Unfortunately, also the second-best shiphunter around - after yours truly, of course."

He huffs.

"Malnaj be hunting Remaro's head or I've never had a roll on the waves. She finds him 'fore us, she'll sink him soon as sighted! Come on, cap!"

He bounces on the balls of his feet.

"Doxy popped a hard-on and a half for hating me the tic I joined the Sorcerer. Remaro shielded me from the worst of her 'training.' When they bountied him, I figured for sure the rat-queen'd be first rat up the gangplank!"

You see a bloodied wax tablet, illegible, except for two words: 'Udyne' and 'Remaro.' 

You find no other sign of Udyne, Malnaj, or Serafen.
"Keep your eyes open and be on your guard."
